entry.title: [CW] Quick check: has the sub just been put into that delayed mode where you can only
entry.content:
Quick check: has the sub just been put into that delayed mode where you can only see new comments in [the feed](https://old.reddit.com/r/TheMotte/comments/) for the first 10 minutes? Everything posted less than that long ago gives the "there's nothing here" error when you view them directly.
I've seen that happen a lot lately. Is it a sauron sign?
